result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مُضِيّٗا وَلَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
result.translation: And if We willed, We could have paralyzed them in their places[18], so they could neither move forward nor backward.
result.footnotes: [18] i.e., We could turn them into inanimate objects.
